title: Aaron Rodgers, Jalen Hurts, Russell Wilson, NCAA
itunes:title: Aaron Rodgers, Jalen Hurts, Russell Wilson, NCAA
description:
Colin discusses the new story about Aaron Rodgers while giving his thoughts on Packers fans, why the Eagles decided to draft Jalen Hurts, why Russell Wilson is important to the NFL, and why the NCAA needs to improve their brand. Guests include Nick Wright, Chris Ballard, AJ Hawk, and Lane Kiffin.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
